title: The Bachelor meets reality | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Beset by controversy, The Bachelor’s latest season is winding down with an identity crisis. It’s a rare case of reality TV reflecting our cultural reality.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Bachelor meets reality | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: The Bachelor's long-time host, Chris Harrison, has stepped away for the season's latest episode after a controversial interview with former bachelorette Rachel Lindsay.
